scripts.migrate:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development
scripts.migrate:demo: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env demo && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env demo
scripts.seed:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env development && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.seed:demo: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env demo && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env demo
